name: Elansar
overview: Elansar is a point & click adventure game in the spirit of Myst. Elansar will let you explore an island and solve puzzles. Will you uncover the Island's mystery ? Elansar is available in English, French, German & Spanish language. Features Mouse support More than 15 enigmas and puzzle to solve 2-Disc game VGA SUPPORT Higher definition support using VGA cable connection
